Job Posting:172265 - Position: W26 Internship - Venture, West: 2026 172265B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 09/19/2025 02:00 PM Through Employer Website 08/27/2025 01:59 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization City Province / State Country Inovia Capital Montreal QC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2026 - Winter W26 Internship - Venture, West: 2026 172265B Co-op Position Calgary, AB or Vancouver, BC Canada 8 months Hybrid CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: Internship - Venture, West: 2026 Responsibilities: As an Intern, you will be assigned to support: • Inovia Venture Investing focuses on Seed and Series A investments. The deal team reviews several investment opportunities every week, screening companies that have early signs of traction and can demonstrate high potential in large markets. Investors in the Venture Team evaluate the startup's team, market, product, as well as KPIs and financials. • Interns will actively contribute to various aspects of the team's day-to-day operations, spanning from deal sourcing to due diligence and portfolio support activities. Key responsibilities include: • Assisting in the sourcing and screening of potential investment opportunities; • Conducting thorough market research and due diligence on identified investment opportunities; • Analyzing industry trends, competitive landscapes, and emerging technologies to inform investment decision-making; • Evaluating financial statements, business models, and projections to assess the viability and potential risks of investment prospects; • Monitoring the performance of existing companies and track relevant industry developments; Assisting in preparing investor reports and updates, and/or presentations for portfolio companies. • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://jobs.ashbyhq.com/InoviaCapital/a14b6950-3012-4b4d-8a36-71def1f5eba0?utm_source=careers.inovia.vc Please note: Apply to one role only. Candidates with multiple applications will be rejected. The application period will close on September 19, 2025 at 5pm. Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
